thread.title: Cricket: Triumphant cricket team return from Malaysia tournament
thread.title_full: Cricket: Triumphant cricket team return from Malaysia tournament

title: Cricket: Triumphant cricket team return from Malaysia tournament
text:
Bahrain national team members with officials upon their return to the kingdom
CRICKET – THE Bahrain Cricket Federation (BCF) warmly welcomed Bahrain’s national cricket team following their title triumph earlier this week in the Malaysia T20I Tri-Series.
The celebration was led by BCF chairman Mohammad Mansoor alongside BCF president Sami Ali and BCF advisors to the board Ali Yousif Lori and Anthony Poulose.
The reception at Bahrain International Airport also had enthusiastic cricket fans and family members on hand, all coming together to honour the team’s incredible achievements.
The kingdom’s cricket national team enjoyed a successful four-nation tour, which included wins over Indonesia and Singapore before clinching the Malaysia T20I Tri-Series by defeating Hong Kong in the final.
